cards.name: The Flash
cards.description: Draw three cards, and then discard a card. (This card starts the game on top of the Super Hero stack).

cards.name: Shazam!
cards.description:
Gain the top two cards of the main deck, play them, and then destroy one of them. (Its effects remain.)
FIRST APPEARANCE -- ATTACK: Each player puts a card with cost 5 or greater from his hand or discard pile on the bottom of the main deck. If you cannot, gain a Weakness.

cards.name: Green Lantern
cards.description: You may play up to three heroes with cost 6 or less from the destroyed pile, and the put them on the bottom of the main deck. If you choose not to, +3 Power.

cards.name: Wonder Woman
cards.description: You may play up to three Villains with cost 6 or less from the destroyed pile, and then put them on the bottom of the main deck. If you choose not to, +3 Power.

cards.name: Swamp Thing
cards.description: +2 Power for each Location in play.

cards.name: Green Arrow
cards.description: When you play this card, leave it front of you for the rest of the game.
cards.ongoing: Punch cards you play have an additional +1 Power.

cards.name: Batman
cards.description: You may play up to three Equipment with cost 6 or less from the destroyed pile, and then put them on the bottom of the main deck. If you choose not to, +3 Power.

cards.name: Constantine
cards.description: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Draw one, destroy one, and put one on top of your deck. Gain VPs equal to the destroyed card's VP value.

cards.name: Cyborg
cards.description: +2 Power for each Super Power and Equipment you play or have played this turn.

cards.name: Martian Manhunter
cards.description: +2 Power for each Hero and Villain you play or have played this turn.

cards.name: Aquaman
cards.description: You may put up to three cards from your discard pile on top of your deck. If you choose not to, +3 Power

cards.name: Superman
cards.description: You may play up to three Super Powers from the destroyed pile, and then put them on the bottom of the main deck. If you choose not to, +4 Power.
